\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{babel}

\begin{document}
\begin{center}
\textsf{\textbf{\Large Cat}}
\par\end{center}{\Large \par}

\textsf{\textbf{Description:}}

Concatenate files and print on the standard output

\textsf{\textbf{Arguments:}}

Name of the file to be printed

\textsf{\textbf{Usage:}}

cal {[}\textsf{\textit{filename}}{]}

\textsf{\textbf{Sample runs:}}

\textsf{1) ./cat cat.txt }

\textsf{======================================================== }

\textsf{cat - concatenate files and print on the standard output ========================================================}

\textsf{Options: -n Number all output lines -T Display TAB characters
as \textasciicircum{}I -E Display \$ at end of each line -h Display
this help -v Show version }
\end{document}
